system.description: Wild and savage. They distrust magic of all kinds and put their faith in themselves before others. Always at the front of a battle, Berserkers love the sport of combat and don't like missile weapons. Not reliable as guards as they are too distracted and are rarely very intelligent. If you are a Berserker be larger than life, brash, not too bright and stupidly brave.

overview.base: You gain Battle Cry Aura and Battle Cry Resistance.
You resist all Conjured spells that aren't self targeted.
You gain 15 temporary HP and become frenzied.
overview.proficient: You gain an additional 5 × P temporary HP and gain Fast.
overview.fluent: You instead gain an additional 5 × F temporary HP and gain Swift.

system.endCondition: You die or 1 minute passes without combat.

overview.base: Target is immune to the next use of a spells that would affect them.

system.endCondition: Once the immunity provided by Throw the Bones is used, this effect ends.

overview.base: You gain Intimidating Presence and Terrify.
At the start of each of your turns, you heal. You cannot restore HP in this way.
You are an expert enforcer.
This ability cannot affect deaf creatures.

results.fail: Targets become frightened.

system.endCondition: At the start of each of the targets' turns, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.

overview.base: You resist being frightened.

system.endCondition: You die or 1 minute passes without combat.

results.fail: If the target is frightened, they immediately take [[/roll 1d4[psychic]]] damage. Additionally, if some effect would cause them to become frightened, they take [[/roll 1d4[psychic]]] damage as well.
